attributes.action: Mandatory driving test to drive on a motorway
attributes.additional_details:
Anyone who uses motorways either frequently or infrequently can see that not everyone has the basic understandings of how the road should be used.

Driving on a normal A or B road is completely different to driving at 70mph on a motorway.

Even the Highways Agency have to remind the public not to hog lane 2 - when it's quite obvious really... or so you'd think.

I think that the current driving tests that are carried out should include the use of a motorway.
